item.title: Philosophy and Meta Physics of "Notes Taking"
item.description: Note taking is a skill that everyone seems to think that they have “solved” it. Whatever that means. They are not interested in investing their time to improve their note taking skill. No interest. No skill. No framework. Regardless of my critique, I think they draw conclusion fairly. Why? around 6 out of 10 people are knowledge workerÂ 1. A subset of those need to use note at all. A subset of those who use notes need to create reusable notes.
